infoLinks.name: And They Shall Know No Fear

rules.name: Lord of Ruin
rules.description: Any Infantry unit with the Chapter Tactics (Lamenters) That Malakim Phoros joins adds +1 to Combat Resolution when determining victory. His Unit may also re-roll any failed morale checks.

rules.name: Rage unto Death
rules.description: For every wound Malakim Phoros loses, increase his Strength and Attacks by +1 (Eg if he is down to 2 wounds, he is Strength 6 with 6 Attacks base). In addition to this, he and any unit he joins gains the Rage (1) Special rule.
